title: Episode 10 - Ben Lerer, Founder Group Nine Media/Thrillist Media Group
description: In this discussion about problem-solving through technology, the ever-changing media landscape, and the future of online content, Ben Lerer shows why he’s a leader in digital media.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
itunes:summary: In this discussion about problem-solving through technology, the ever-changing media landscape, and the future of online content, Ben Lerer shows why he’s a leader in digital media.
